sqlroot.sql: SELECT c.ID, c.menu_name, c.menu_url, c.serial_num, c.isshow, c.description, NVL (d.totalcount, 0) totalcount FROM t_sys_menu c LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.ID, COUNT (1) totalcount FROM t_sys_menu a JOIN (SELECT ID FROM t_sys_menu WHERE parent_menu_id = :parentMenuId) b ON b.ID = a.parent_menu_id GROUP BY b.ID) d ON d.ID = c.ID WHERE c.parent_menu_id = :parentMenuId ORDER BY c.serial_num

SELECT a.ID, a.menu_name, a.menu_url FROM t_sys_menu a JOIN (SELECT c.menu_id FROM t_sys_acl c JOIN t_sys_usersroles d ON d.role_id = c.role_id WHERE d.user_id = :userId AND BITAND (c.operate_status, 8) = 8 GROUP BY c.menu_id) b ON b.menu_id = ID WHERE a.isshow = 1 AND a.parent_menu_id = :parentMenuId ORDER BY a.serial_num

sql.name: system.menu.getMainFrame
sql.desc: 根据父id递归查询叶子节点

sqlroot.sql: SELECT a.ID, a.menu_name, a.menu_url, a.parent_menu_id FROM (SELECT ID, menu_name, menu_url, parent_menu_id, serial_num FROM t_sys_menu START WITH ID = :parentMenuId CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = parent_menu_id AND isshow = 1) a JOIN (SELECT c.menu_id FROM t_sys_acl c JOIN t_sys_usersroles d ON d.role_id = c.role_id WHERE d.user_id = :userId AND BITAND (c.operate_status, 8) = 8 GROUP BY c.menu_id) b ON b.menu_id = a.ID ORDER BY a.parent_menu_id, a.serial_num

sql.name: system.menu.getNodePosition
sql.desc: 根据id获取该节点所在位置

sqlroot.sql: SELECT COUNT (1) FROM t_sys_menu START WITH ID = :menuId CONNECT BY ID = PRIOR parent_menu_id

sql.name: system.acl.getAclAndMenu
sql.desc: 根据父id和roleId查询子菜单和操作权限

sqlroot.sql: SELECT e.ID, e.menu_name, e.totalcount, NVL (f.operate_status, 0) operate_status FROM (SELECT c.ID, c.menu_name, NVL (d.totalcount, 0) totalcount, c.serial_num FROM t_sys_menu c LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.ID, COUNT (1) totalcount FROM t_sys_menu a JOIN (SELECT ID FROM t_sys_menu WHERE parent_menu_id = :parentMenuId) b ON b.ID = a.parent_menu_id GROUP BY b.ID) d ON d.ID = c.ID WHERE c.parent_menu_id = :parentMenuId) e LEFT JOIN (SELECT menu_id, operate_status FROM t_sys_acl WHERE role_id = :roleId) f ON f.menu_id = e.ID ORDER BY e.serial_num

sql.name: system.acl.getOperateStatus
sql.desc: 根据用户id和菜单id查看操作权限

sqlroot.sql: SELECT a.operate_status FROM t_sys_acl a JOIN t_sys_usersroles b ON b.role_id = a.role_id WHERE a.menu_id = :menuId AND b.user_id = :userId

sql.name: system.acl.getAclListByUserId
sql.desc: 根据用户id查看拥有的权限

sqlroot.sql: SELECT c.menu_alias, a.operate_status FROM t_sys_acl a JOIN t_sys_usersroles b ON b.role_id = a.role_id JOIN t_sys_menu c ON c.ID = a.menu_id WHERE b.user_id = :userId AND c.menu_alias IS NOT NULL
